channel.title: Normal rs attacking speeds?
channel.description: Hello How do I make it so my server has Normal Rs attacking speeds?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 09, 2007, 05:25:35 PM[/size][hr]Please and thank you :D[br][size=1]Posted on: May 09, 2007, 05:45:00 PM[/size][hr]I know there is a way but I cant find it on the server tutorials list.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 09, 2007, 06:29:31 PM[/size][hr]I guess no one knows of one?

item.title: Normal rs attacking speeds?
item.dc:creator: @Zenadix Zenadix
item.description:
@Zenadix wrote:

LOL THIS IS SO EASY… so many answers and nobody has still answered his question… how LoL

But its time for me to post

search for

public boolean Attack() { int EnemyX = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX; int EnemyY = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY; int EnemyHP = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; int EnemyHPExp = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerXP[playerHitpoints]; client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn]; boolean RingOfLife = false; if (PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerEquipment[playerRing] == 2570) { RingOfLife = true; } int hitDiff = 0; int wepdelay = 0; CalculateMaxHit(); hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit);

UNDER IT , add this code:

PkingDelay = 2; wepdelay = 2;

where u can change “2” to make it faster or slower

here you go!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Normal rs attacking speeds?
item.dc:creator: @archerkill30 archerkill30
item.description:
@archerkill30 wrote:

Yes I have Testscape but if Testscape is a problem I will switch sources just tell me what one.

PS: does this stop people from mass clicking?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 09, 2007, 08:08:04 PM[/size][hr]what are your timers? and where can I change them?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 10, 2007, 05:37:09 AM[/size][hr][playerWeapon] == (4151)) // whip

Found where to change the timers but what should they be set at?
and how do I stop them from mass clicking?

@NojTB wrote:

if ppl took a full day, even a hour to get to level 10 on it they gotta be blind…
